title: HORSERADISH-GLAZED HAM RECIPE
directions: Using a sharp knife, score surface of ham with 1/4-in.-deep cuts in a diamond pattern; insert a clove in each diamond. Bake according to package directions.
Meanwhile, mix remaining ingredients. Brush over ham during the last 30 minutes of cooking. Yield: 12 servings.
ingredients: 1 fully cooked bone-in ham (5 to 6 pounds)
